rules_text:
Flying, menace
Whenever Yuki and Mai attacks, tap up to two target creatures and Yuki and Mai deals 3 damage to each of up to two target creatures.
When Yuki and Mai dies, choose one –
• Tap up to four target creatures.
• Yuki and Mai deals 3 damage to each of up to four target creatures
